information.label: introduction
information.content: Android developer with 9+ years of experience, including the live streaming App, game streaming App, social network App, healthy App for Bluetooth headset, OTT-Box, etc. Familiar with Kotlin, Java, Coroutine, KTX, Jetpack, Jsoup, Gson, Glide, Picasso, Fresco, Retrofit, Firebase. Refactoring coding by design pattern such as MVC, MVP, MVVM, SOLID principle. Also, experienced in improving performance, debugging in OOM, ANR issue, using benchmark tools for measuring performance, as well as Jenkins CI/CD.
